main event: A civilian observed a round-shaped object that appeared triangular while moving, emitting red and blue lights, in Rome, New York on May 20, 1965.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 30 minutes,It changed shape and color during observation,The conclusion from the investigating officer was that the object might have been a star or satellite,No photographic evidence was collected with the report,There is a reference to potential weather inversion at 7,000 ft.
sighted object: one round-shaped object emitting red and blue lights
witness description: civilian observer, a fire chief in the Signal Corp
